remarks: The set of expressions, which are pairs whose first element is a typecode, and whose second element is a list of constants and variables.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Jul-2016.)
statement:
mexval.k $e |- K = ( mTC ` T ) $.
mexval.e $e |- E = ( mEx ` T ) $.
mexval2.c $e |- C = ( mCN ` T ) $.
mexval2.v $e |- V = ( mVR ` T ) $.
mexval2 $p |- E = ( K X. Word ( C u. V ) ) $.
